newsletter.title: Event Recap: Scholarship Banquet
newsletter.description: SHPE Austin recently recognized the winners of the SHPE Scholarships: William Torres (L) , Mark Sand (R), and David Castro (Not pictured) for being excellent leaders in their communities. Congratulations !

newsletter.title: Networking with UT Students
newsletter.description: Join SHPE Austin TODAY at Posse East (2900 Duval Rd. 78705). Free appetizers will be provided.

newsletter.title: Spring Fresh Start 2016
newsletter.description:
SHPE Austin will be partnering up with NSBE Professional to host a family STEM event. This event will be open to middle school thru high school students. In addition, volunteers are needed to facilitate and/or lead workshop activities.
Date: May 15th at Applied Materials (9700 E Hwy 290, 78724)

newsletter.title: SHPE and NSBE Pool Party
newsletter.description:
SHPE Austin and NSBE Austin Professional will be hosting a pool party for Austin area engineering interns. Come build your personal and professional network with members from various backgrounds, disciplines, and universities. 
Date: July 9th (3-6PM) Location: TBD

newsletter.title: Sign up for Softball TODAY
newsletter.description:
If you are interested in playing a sport with a "Professional" team in a friendly league, join the SHPE Austin Athletic team. We encourage players from all levels to come have a blast with us in Softball, Volleyball, Kickball, and more. For more information contact Carlos Pizarro.

Click on the image to access the survey

newsletter.title: Recap: Latinitas Code Chica Conference 2016
newsletter.description: Latinitas and SHPE Austin would like to thank all volunteers that came out to help out at the Latinitas Code Chica Conference. The event taught girls how to use media and technology to design, code and market their own mobile app idea. Overall, the event was a success!
